sub_fields.label: Single Image Size (Left)
sub_fields.name: single_image_size_left
sub_fields.instructions:
Upload dimensions are double the display size so images display ok on retina screens.
And when rendered, the image is scaled down proportionally to meet the maximum display width and height. Image maximum display dimensions.

Small image minimum upload dimensions: 460x460
Small image maximum display dimensions: 230x230
Medium image minimum upload dimensions: 560x862
Medium image maximum display dimensions: 280x431
Large image minimum upload dimensions: 642x942
Large image maximum display dimensions: 321x471
Full image minimum upload dimensions: 726x1022
Full image maximum display dimensions: 363x511
